description: The description of a MetaData tag attached to a class member or a class

members.description: The argument pairs (if any) associated with a Metadata tag in [Event(name="boom")] the args array would be of length 1 the array contains MetaDataArgDefinitions
convenience method for retrieving a set of args with a specific key Most often this would be of length 1, but it is possible for there to be multiple MetaDataArgDefinitions with the same key

values: key the key to search for
an array of MetaDataArgDefinitions with the matching key.

members.description: Used primarily for debugging purposes, this provides a string representation of this MetaDataDefinition

values: a String representation of this MetaDataDefinition
